name: Super Jomo
description:
www.sephoras.netApplication smartphone Android et IOS .
Super Jomo est un jeu vidéo réalisé en collaboration avec le musée aquatique  : Nausicaá, centre national de la mer.
Endless runner dans lequel Jomo le manchot dois survivre au fonds marins et ses dangers le plus longtemps possible.

Direction artistique, conception et réalisation, illustration : Séphora Schmidt
Outils : Illustrator, Photoshop et Unity 3D.
Développement & gameplay : Gilles Desmoulins - Nemoïd
Gestion du Projet : Comediart
Sound design : Vert foncé
Marketting : Résonéo

--

Youve already met Jomo in the first app for the Little Ones. Meet him again in a totally new game specially made for iPhone and iPad.You will need dexterity and speed to help Jomo cross all the oceans in this action-packed game.You will have to avoid all kinds of dangerous sea creatures found deep in the sea and also cruel fishermen with their menacing nets.

Equip your African Penguin with the latest and most efficient accessories. For the most talented of you, surprises are ahead! - Feel the gliding sensation of the African Penguin diving in the deep- Avoid obstacles with him- Make him jump high (deliberately)- Equip yourself with new objects in order to experience a different game each time you play- Presentation of Nausicaa- Presentation of SANCCOB- Compatible with iPhone, iPad and iPod Touch- Prizes to be wonMeet Jomo the cheeky baby African Penguin at Nausicaa Sea Centre, where the whole family can enjoy discovering sea life in vast and colorful aquariums full of magical species.

With more than 5 000 m2 of exhibition space, discover the 35 000 animals of NAUSICAA. Underwater explorations, giant aquariums, spectacular special effects and animations but also birth of marine life awaits you in this unique magical world.
